page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Children play a variety of seasonal playground games. In Autumn conker tournaments are popular as are tag and shadow tag. Children play marbles, hop-scotch and 'it', skipping with ropes, and many other games. In Forty Forty Saves All a tree acts as a base and one person stands beside it and counts to forty-four while the others hide; he or she then goes to search for those hiding shouting 'Forty Forty'. If one is spotted, the aim is to get back to the base first. If someone reaches the post without being noticed all players are freed. Other games include Kiss Chase; Pick-a-back races; Wheel-barrow races, Hide and Seek.
